Aniket Handa

dream. design. develop

Hi! I am currently a graduate student in Human-Computer Interaction + Design (MHCID) at University of Washington, Seattle. I already hold a dual Master and Bachelor degrees in Computer Science & Engineering from Jaypee Institute of Information Technology, Noida. My interests lies around HCI, Wearables, UbiComp, Ambient Technology, Computer Vision, and Data Visualization.

Find all my posts here.
